content.query:
url = "https://malwee.vtexcommercestable.com.br/api/oms/pvt/orders?f_creationDate=creationDate:[2020-02-02T00:09:00.000Z TO 2020-02-02T23:10:00.000Z]"

update [dbo].[CTR_ADF_API_ENDPOINT] 
set NOM_URL_RELATIVA = 'orders?f_creationDate=creationDate:',
VAL_PARAMETRO_1 = 'BGSTNGUYXERIIEDBJRZSYUKFBQKUWMSXDYKWMCMYQUIWBNIBKWWHACSHVNSWWZCKMTFKTHOGEACELODNHIKAPKXAGDAZKQCQRXJIHYICHPCAANVHJEONPCUBWFEPHPWO',
VAL_PARAMETRO_2 = 'vtexappkey-malwee-AHFBTB',
VAL_PARAMETRO_3 = null,
VAL_PARAMETRO_4 = NULL
where  COD_ENDPOINT = 4

SELECT CONVERT(varchar(50), DAT_INGESTAO, 127) +'Z',DAT_INGESTAO    FROM [dbo].[CTR_ADF_API_ENDPOINT] where  COD_ENDPOINT = 4


2021-03-11T00:00:00.000Z
SELECT
CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(DATE,DAT_INGESTAO)) + 'T00:00:00.000Z' AS DATA_INICIO_ORDER_VTEX ,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(DATE,DAT_ULTI_PROCESSAMENTO)) + 'T00:00:00.000Z' AS DATA_FINAL_ORDER_VTEX
FROM [dbo].[CTR_ADF_API_ENDPOINT] where  COD_ENDPOINT = 4

 
SELECT * FROM  [dbo].[CTR_ADF_API_ENDPOINT] where  COD_ENDPOINT = 4




BGSTNGUYXERIIEDBJRZSYUKFBQKUWMSXDYKWMCMYQUIWBNIBKWWHACSHVNSWWZCKMTFKTHOGEACELODNHIKAPKXAGDAZKQCQRXJIHYICHPCAANVHJEONPCUBWFEPHPWO




[dbo].[PADFCredenciaisAPI]  5
[dbo].[PADFCredenciaisAPI] 4
[dbo].[PLogADFItemAPI] 4


@concat(activity('LeCredenciaisOrigem').output.FirstRow.NOM_URL_RELATIVA,
'[',
activity('LeCredenciaisOrigem').output.FirstRow.DATA_INICIO_ORDER_VTEX,
' TO ',
activity('LeCredenciaisOrigem').output.FirstRow.DATA_FINAL_ORDER_VTEX,
']')


[dbo].[PADFCredenciaisAPI] 4
GO

[dbo].[PADFDataProcessamentoAPI] 4
GO


url = "https://malwee.vtexcommercestable.com.br/api/oms/pvt/orders?f_creationDate=creationDate:[2020-02-02T00:09:00.000Z TO 2020-02-02T23:10:00.000Z]"
															orders?f_creationDate=creationDate:[2021-01-28T00:00:00.000Z TO 2021-03-11T00:00:00.000Z]


@toLower(concat(
activity('LeCredenciaisOrigem').output.firstRow.NOM_ALIAS_ENDPOINT,
'_',
substring(activity('LeDataProcessamento').output.firstRow.DAT_HORA_PROCESSAMENTO,0,4),
substring(activity('LeDataProcessamento').output.firstRow.DAT_HORA_PROCESSAMENTO,5,2),
substring(activity('LeDataProcessamento').output.firstRow.DAT_HORA_PROCESSAMENTO,8,2),
substring(activity('LeDataProcessamento').output.firstRow.DAT_HORA_PROCESSAMENTO,11,2),
substring(activity('LeDataProcessamento').output.firstRow.DAT_HORA_PROCESSAMENTO,14,2),'.json')) 

@concat(
activity('LeCredenciaisOrigem').output.FirstRow.NOM_URL_RELATIVA,
'[',
activity('LeCredenciaisOrigem').output.FirstRow.DATA_INICIO_ORDER_VTEX,
' TO ',
activity('LeCredenciaisOrigem').output.FirstRow.DATA_FINAL_ORDER_VTEX,
']')
